title.narrative: Secondary Towns Integrated Urban Environmental Improvement Project

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to develop reliable, affordable, and effective municipal infrastructure and to strengthening the capacity of municipalities and the central government for project management and operation. The project area is Biratnagar, Birgunj, Butwal municipalities and Kavre Valley (Panauti, Dhulikhel and Banepa municipalities). The project was approved in 6 July 2010 and the planned project closing date is 30 June 2016.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved and affordable municipal services delivered effectively, efficiently, and reliably by accountable project municipalities.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
1.3.a 75% of wastewater in the service area collected and treated to meet environmental standards in Biratnagar

description.narrative: Improved and affordable municipal services delivered effectively, efficiently, and reliably by accountable project municipalities.

title.narrative: 1.3.b 75% of wastewater in the service area collected and treated to meet environmental standards in Birgunj

description.narrative: Improved and affordable municipal services delivered effectively, efficiently, and reliably by accountable project municipalities.

title.narrative: 1.4 85% of municipal population has access to improved [80 liters per capita per day (lpcd) for fully plumbed connections, 65 lpcd for yard connections, and 40 lpcd for stand posts, satisfying national drinking water quality standards, with 24-hour supply] water services in Kavre Valley [90% in Banepa, 100% in Dhulikhel and 80% in Panauti, respectively]

description.narrative: Improved and affordable municipal services delivered effectively, efficiently, and reliably by accountable project municipalities.

title.narrative: 1.2.a 90% of municipal waste collected, and all nonrecyclable waste disposed of in the landfill in Birgunj

description.narrative: Improved and affordable municipal services delivered effectively, efficiently, and reliably by accountable project municipalities.

title.narrative: 1.2.b 90% of municipal waste collected, and all nonrecyclable waste disposed of in the landfill in Butwal

description.narrative: Improved and affordable municipal services delivered effectively, efficiently, and reliably by accountable project municipalities.

title.narrative: 1.1.a No major waterlogging in the core municipal area in Biratnagar

description.narrative: Improved and affordable municipal services delivered effectively, efficiently, and reliably by accountable project municipalities.

title.narrative: 1.1.b No major waterlogging in the core municipal area in Birgunj

description.narrative: Improved and affordable municipal services delivered effectively, efficiently, and reliably by accountable project municipalities.
